mapper.select: SELECT count(1) as scoreTotalNum, sum( CASE WHEN s.score = 1 then 1 else 0 end ) as oneStarNum, sum( CASE WHEN s.score = 2 then 1 else 0 end ) as twoStarNum, sum( CASE WHEN s.score = 3 then 1 else 0 end ) as threeStarNum, sum( CASE WHEN s.score = 4 then 1 else 0 end ) as fourStarNum, sum( CASE WHEN s.score = 5 then 1 else 0 end ) as fiveStarNum FROM t_member_score s WHERE s.member_id = #{memberId}

select s.id, s.score, s.content, m.id as judgerId, m.nice_name as judgerNiceName, m.avatar as judgerAvatar, m.sex as judgerSex, t.id as taskId t.title as taskTitle from t_member_score s join member m on s.judger_id = m.id join t_task t on s.task_id=t.id where s.member_id = #{memberId} ORDER BY s.create_time DESC LIMIT #{page.offset},#{page.limit}
select count(1) from t_member_score s join member m on s.judger_id = m.id join t_task t on s.task_id=t.id where s.member_id = #{memberId}
